name: ROBOTS 3D
description:
Fight off waves of ROBOTS using different weapons and tactics in this first person shooter!

Unlock, customise and upgrade different weapons on your way to the top of the leaderboards!

Features:
► Fun & satisfying guns
► Progression system for longevity
► Leaderboards & achievements
► Weapon upgrades and customisation
► Two maps with potential for different strategies
► Large options menu with graphic settings and more
► Customisable controller support
► 60 fps gameplay on most devices
► Usable and customisable controls!
► Colorful and clean graphics

Have fun!
